casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.P. No. 534A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 8, 2007. Theresa A. Boucher, Assistant County Attorney, for Forsyth DSS. Katherine Chester, for Mother-Parks. Gary C. Rhodes, Salisbury, for Hylton. Randi Weiss, Winston-Salem, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of January 2007 by Respondent (Father) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Father-Parks) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of February 2007."
